welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Inwood, a charming city known for its rich history and natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our vibrant community has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Republic Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily serving domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily serving United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Limited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Premium Wi-Fi is available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
